Localization.Name: Aegis Dynamics
Localization.Description: Aegis grew to prominence as a manufacturer of military spacecraft during the First Tevarin War. Favored by Ivar Messer, their orbital bombers grew to public prominence after his infamous victory on Idris IV and became synonymous with the ruthless Messer regime that followed. After the Fall of the Imperator, Aegis' contracts were stripped, their ships fell out of favor with the public, and the company went into a tailspin. They downsized their craft production and turned to manufacturing parts. However, time heals all wounds and today Aegis has risen once again to be a top military contractor of ships and components.

Localization.Name: AAT-34 Turret
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Anti-Aircraft Turret

Maintain order with the AAT-34 anti-aircraft turret. This rugged design is ideal for perimeter protection and can survive long exposure to the elements with minimal maintenance while still providing first class defensive fire from its S10 weapon and dual S7 missile launchers. Its custom targeting software also helps to maximize area coverage while keeping placement numbers reasonable; protecting more sky with fewer turrets.

English.Name: Hurston Dynamics
English.Description: Hurston Dynamics Manufacturer placeholder info about company.

Localization.Name: Attrition-4 Repeater
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Hurston Dynamics
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 4

Hurston Dynamics has fully integrated it's cascade laser technology into their Attrition-line of repeaters. The size four Attrition-4 is no exception, operating at peak performance when near its maximum thermal capacity.

Localization.Name: Regulus
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

The Regulus is the power plant you can count on when everyone is counting on you. Made to exceed exacting military standards, Aegis’ design team has made sure that you have the extra power you need, when you need it most.

Localization.Name: Avalanche
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 2
Grade: A
Class: Military

Showcasing the best of mil-spec cooler technology, the Aegis Avalanche thermal management unit has been built from the ground up to endure the demanding needs of the battlefield.
